issue.title: Deleting a resource has no pop-up confirmation process
issue.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

In the FE, when deleting a resource (menu "Manage"), it deletes the diffusion parameters directly.
There is no validation message "are you sure"... or something like this.

In one click, the user can lost hours of work !!!!!!!!



**Fixed versions :** 4.0.2

comments.body:
**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

In frontoffice, when a user remove a resource, application must prompt before a confirmation modal (OK/Cancel) with such message: "Please confirm removing resource <name of the resource>.

**Original author :** Battaglia Marc

I added a confirmation modal.
